about_the_game:
Super Choppy Orc is a thrilling 2D precision/puzzle platformer that puts players in the shoes of an Orc on a journey to escape monster-infested caves and rescue his friends.

Gameplay


Master the use of your magical Axe to:
Create platforms and reach higher areas


Double jump and get an extra boost of height and distance


Float and gain an extra level of maneuverability


Destroy your enemies and clear a path to victory

Features


In addition to its challenging gameplay, the game offers beautiful pixel art and retro-inspired music that transport players back to the golden age of arcade gaming.
With its speedrun-friendly design and accessibility options, Super Choppy Orc is a must-play for platformer fans of all skill levels.

Accessibility


  • No use of flashing lights or repeatable patterns, which can be triggering for some players
  • The ability to highlight different walls with the color of the player's choice, making it easier for colorblind players to navigate the game
  • Remappable controls, allowing players to customize the controls to their preferences
  • The ability to slow down the gameplay, making it easier for players with mobility or coordination issues to play the game
  • The option to become invincible, allowing players to enjoy the game without fear of failure or frustration

Speedrun


Join the and challenge yourself to become the best at Super Choppy Orc.
Can you master the power of the magical Axe and emerge victorious?
Play now and find out!

short_description: Help Choppy Orc release his friends from their chest prisons. Strike enemies with your Axe or pin it on a wall to make a bouncy platform for Choppy Orc to jump on. Utilise the different kind of walls, each one alters the way you move through the level. Spring up, dash forward or float away!
supported_languages: English, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Arabic, Greek, Japanese, Portuguese - Brazil, Simplified Chinese
